title: Makes residential facilities controlled by state agencies subject to local site plan review
summary: Makes residential facilities controlled by state agencies subject to local site plan review.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 821                                                    A. 524

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN  SENATE -- Introduced by Sen. LITTLE -- read twice and ordered print-
         ed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Cities

       IN ASSEMBLY -- Introduced by M. of A. SAYWARD,  FINCH,  HAWLEY,  CROUCH,
         CASTRO,  CALHOUN,  CORWIN,  DUPREY  --  Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A.
         BURLING, DESTITO, GALEF, GIGLIO, JORDAN, KOLB, P. LOPEZ, MAGEE,  McDO-
         NOUGH,  O'DONNELL, REILLY, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Local Governments

       AN ACT to amend the general city law, the town law and the village  law,
         in relation to making residential facilities of state agencies subject
         to local site plan review

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 27-a of the general city law is amended by adding a
    2  new subdivision 1-a to read as follows:
    3    1-A. WAIVER OF STATE IMMUNITY. THE STATE HEREBY  WAIVES  ITS  IMMUNITY
    4  FROM  LIABILITY  FOR  THE COMPLIANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION
    5  SOLELY WITH REGARD TO RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES.  EVERY STATE AGENCY  SHALL
    6  SUBMIT  A SITE PLAN FOR EACH PARCEL OF LAND UNDER ITS CONTROL UPON WHICH
    7  A RESIDENTIAL FACILITY IS TO BE  OR  HAS  BEEN  CONSTRUCTED.    FOR  THE
    8  PURPOSES  OF  THIS SECTION, "STATE AGENCY" MEANS ANY DEPARTMENT, BUREAU,
    9  COMMISSION, BOARD, PUBLIC  AUTHORITY  OR  OTHER  AGENCY  OF  THE  STATE,
   10  INCLUDING  ANY  PUBLIC  BENEFIT CORPORATION ANY MEMBER OF WHOSE BOARD IS
   11  APPOINTED BY THE GOVERNOR.
   12    S 2. Section 274-a of the town law is amended by adding a new subdivi-
   13  sion 1-a to read as follows:
   14    1-A. WAIVER OF STATE IMMUNITY. THE STATE HEREBY  WAIVES  ITS  IMMUNITY
   15  FROM  LIABILITY  FOR  THE COMPLIANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION
   16  SOLELY WITH REGARD TO RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES.  EVERY STATE AGENCY  SHALL
   17  SUBMIT  A SITE PLAN FOR EACH PARCEL OF LAND UNDER ITS CONTROL UPON WHICH

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.

    1  A RESIDENTIAL FACILITY IS TO BE  OR  HAS  BEEN  CONSTRUCTED.    FOR  THE
    2  PURPOSES  OF  THIS SECTION, "STATE AGENCY" MEANS ANY DEPARTMENT, BUREAU,
    3  COMMISSION, BOARD, PUBLIC  AUTHORITY  OR  OTHER  AGENCY  OF  THE  STATE,
    4  INCLUDING  ANY  PUBLIC  BENEFIT CORPORATION ANY MEMBER OF WHOSE BOARD IS
    5  APPOINTED BY THE GOVERNOR.
    6    S 3. Section 7-725-a of the village law is amended  by  adding  a  new
    7  subdivision 1-a to read as follows:
    8    1-A.  WAIVER  OF  STATE IMMUNITY. THE STATE HEREBY WAIVES ITS IMMUNITY
    9  FROM LIABILITY FOR THE COMPLIANCE WITH THE PROVISIONS  OF  THIS  SECTION
   10  SOLELY  WITH  REGARD TO RESIDENTIAL FACILITIES. EVERY STATE AGENCY SHALL
   11  SUBMIT A SITE PLAN FOR EACH PARCEL OF LAND UNDER ITS CONTROL UPON  WHICH
   12  A  RESIDENTIAL  FACILITY  IS  TO  BE  OR HAS BEEN CONSTRUCTED.   FOR THE
   13  PURPOSES OF THIS SECTION, "STATE AGENCY" MEANS ANY  DEPARTMENT,  BUREAU,
   14  COMMISSION,  BOARD,  PUBLIC  AUTHORITY  OR  OTHER  AGENCY  OF THE STATE,
   15  INCLUDING ANY PUBLIC BENEFIT CORPORATION ANY MEMBER OF  WHOSE  BOARD  IS
   16  APPOINTED BY THE GOVERNOR.
   17    S 4. Within 90 days of the effective date of this act each state agen-
   18  cy  which has constructed a residential facility upon any parcel of land
   19  under its control prior to the effective date of this act shall submit a
   20  site plan for such parcel to the appropriate city, town or village.
   21    S 5. This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day  after  it  shall
   22  have become a law.
